segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle at her feet, and I feel a sense of urgency.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is really determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling as he stretches further, and I feel a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is waiting patiently for her share, her eyes fixed on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so the woman won't hear them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spreading across the floor, making it even more slippery, and I feel a sense of fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be shocked when she finally turns around and sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and peaceful, and I feel a sense of longing for that tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy's hand is almost in the cookie jar, and I feel a sense of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is holding her breath, waiting for her cookie, and I feel a sense of empathy for her excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman's foot in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice, and I feel a sense of frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR
